name: myTouch 3G Slide
description:
Make your phone your own. Choose from lots of themes, skins, wallpapers, menus, and icons. 
Slide out the keyboard and get comfortable. A slide-out keyboard with 3.4-inch screen let you read, watch, and type anywhere.  
Swype® keyboard – Enter text in one continuous motion, up to 40 words per minute. In no time you will be able to Swype as fast as you think. 
Don’t miss out. YOU are a shutterbug. Capture all of your favorite moments with a 5MP camera with autofocus and flash. 
Come on, get app-y.Choose from thousands of apps on the Android Market™—like Sherpa, a search app that gets to know your tastes over time.

connectivity.cell: Quad band GSM 850 900 1800 1900 MHz GPRS/EDGE, Tri band UMTS 900 1700 2100 MHz HSDPA/HSUPA (US/Europe) (7.2/2 Mbit/s)
